Query.Name: Query
Query.Sql: select "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_col1" as "Score Column 1", "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_colmeasure1" as "Measure Column 1", "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_col2" as "Score Column 2", "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_colmeasure2" as "Measure Columns 2 ", "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_standard" as "Standard", "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_capabilityquality" as "Standard Capability Quality", "rc_scorestandard_values"."value_score" as "Score #", "rc_scorestandard_values"."value_scoretext" as "Score Definition", "rc_scorestandard_values"."value_measures" as "ignore.0", "rc_scorecards"."card_name" as "Card Name", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure" as "ignore.1", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure_notes" as "ignore.2", "rc_scorecards"."card_desc" as "ignore.3", "rc_scorecards"."card_col1" as "Milestone 1 Label", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure1", "rc_scorecards"."card_colenabled1", "rc_scorecards"."card_col2" as "Milestone 2 Label", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure2" from ((("dbo"."rc_scorecards_scores" "rc_scorecards_scores" inner join "dbo"."rc_scorecards_standards" "rc_scorecards_standards" on ("rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_id" = "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_standard")) inner join "dbo"."rc_scorestandard_values" "rc_scorestandard_values" on ("rc_scorestandard_values"."value_standard" = "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_id")) inner join "dbo"."rc_scorecards" "rc_scorecards" on ("rc_scorecards"."card_id" = "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_card"))

Query.Name: Query
Query.Sql: select "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_col1" as "Score Column 1", "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_colmeasure1" as "Measure Column 1", "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_col2" as "Score Column 2", "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_colmeasure2" as "Measure Columns 2 ", "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_standard" as "Standard", "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_capabilityquality" as "Standard Capability Quality", "rc_scorestandard_values"."value_score" as "Score #", "rc_scorestandard_values"."value_scoretext" as "Score Definition", "rc_scorestandard_values"."value_measures" as "ignore.0", "rc_scorecards"."card_name" as "Card Name", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure" as "ignore.1", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure_notes" as "ignore.2", "rc_scorecards"."card_desc" as "ignore.3", "rc_scorecards"."card_col1" as "Milestone 1 Label", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure1", "rc_scorecards"."card_colenabled1", "rc_scorecards"."card_col2" as "Milestone 2 Label", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure2", "rc_assessment_areas"."area_name", "rc_assessment_areas"."area_identifier", "rc_assessment_processes"."bp_name", "rc_assessment_processes"."bp_identifier" from (((((("dbo"."rc_scorecards_scores" "rc_scorecards_scores" inner join "dbo"."rc_scorecards_standards" "rc_scorecards_standards" on ("rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_id" = "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_standard")) inner join "dbo"."rc_scorestandard_values" "rc_scorestandard_values" on ("rc_scorestandard_values"."value_standard" = "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_id")) inner join "dbo"."rc_scorecards" "rc_scorecards" on ("rc_scorecards"."card_id" = "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_card")) inner join "dbo"."rc_assessment_areas" "rc_assessment_areas" on ("rc_assessment_areas"."area_id" = "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_itemid")) inner join "dbo"."rc_assessment_categories" "rc_assessment_categories" on ("rc_assessment_categories"."cat_baID" = "rc_assessment_areas"."area_id")) inner join "dbo"."rc_assessment_processes" "rc_assessment_processes" on ("rc_assessment_processes"."bp_bcID" = "rc_assessment_categories"."cat_id"))

Query.Name: Query
Query.Sql: select distinct "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_col1" as "Score Column 1", "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_colmeasure1" as "Measure Column 1", "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_col2" as "Score Column 2", "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_colmeasure2" as "Measure Columns 2 ", "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_standard" as "Standard", "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_capabilityquality" as "Standard Capability Quality", "rc_scorestandard_values"."value_score" as "Score #", "rc_scorestandard_values"."value_scoretext" as "Score Definition", "rc_scorestandard_values"."value_measures" as "ignore.0", "rc_scorecards"."card_name" as "Card Name", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure" as "ignore.1", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure_notes" as "ignore.2", "rc_scorecards"."card_desc" as "ignore.3", "rc_scorecards"."card_col1" as "Milestone 1 Label", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure1", "rc_scorecards"."card_colenabled1", "rc_scorecards"."card_col2" as "Milestone 2 Label", "rc_scorecards"."card_measure2", "rc_assessment_processes"."bp_name", "rc_assessment_processes"."bp_identifier", "rc_assessment_areas"."area_name", "rc_assessment_areas"."area_identifier", "rc_assessment_areas_1"."area_name" as "rc_assessment_areas_1_area_name", "rc_assessment_areas_1"."area_identifier" as "rc_assessment_areas_1_area_identifier" from ((((((("dbo"."rc_scorecards_scores" "rc_scorecards_scores" inner join "dbo"."rc_scorecards_standards" "rc_scorecards_standards" on ("rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_id" = "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_standard")) inner join "dbo"."rc_scorestandard_values" "rc_scorestandard_values" on ("rc_scorestandard_values"."value_standard" = "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_id")) inner join "dbo"."rc_scorecards" "rc_scorecards" on ("rc_scorecards"."card_id" = "rc_scorecards_standards"."stan_card")) left join "dbo"."rc_assessment_processes" "rc_assessment_processes" on ("rc_assessment_processes"."bp_id" = "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_itemid")) left join "dbo"."rc_assessment_categories" "rc_assessment_categories" on ("rc_assessment_categories"."cat_id" = "rc_assessment_processes"."bp_bcID")) left join "dbo"."rc_assessment_areas" "rc_assessment_areas" on ("rc_assessment_areas"."area_id" = "rc_scorecards_scores"."score_itemid")) left join "dbo"."rc_assessment_areas" "rc_assessment_areas_1" on ("rc_assessment_areas_1"."area_id" = "rc_assessment_categories"."cat_baID")) where ("rc_scorecards"."card_name" <> N'Barbara BCM Test')
